splits.name: 6502_instructions_load_store_arithmetic
splits.description: 6502 load/store (LDA, LDX, LDY, STA, STX, STY) and arithmetic (ADC, SBC) instructions with all addressing modes, opcodes, and flags

splits.name: 6502_instructions_inc_dec_transfer_logic
splits.description: 6502 increment/decrement (INC, INX, INY, DEC, DEX, DEY), register transfer (TAX, TAY, TXA, TYA), and logical (AND, EOR, ORA) instructions

splits.name: 6502_instructions_compare_shift_branch_stack
splits.description: 6502 compare/bit test (CMP, CPX, CPY, BIT), shift/rotate (ASL, LSR, ROL, ROR), branch (BCC-BVS), jump (JMP, JSR), stack (PHA, PLA, PHP, PLP), and flag instructions
